mapper.select: select c.*, u.username as topicUsername, uu.username as commentUsername, t.title, t.id as topicId from comment c left join topic t on t.id = c.topic_id left join user u on t.user_id = u.id left join user uu on c.user_id = uu.id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by t.in_time desc
select count(1) from comment where to_days(in_time) = to_days(now());
